document_data.name: Ellardin Darovik
document_data.mainbody: '''Ellardin Darovik''' was the priest of [[Goldenfields]] and a member of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Activities: The priest managed the largest walled temple-farm to [[Chauntea]] in the [[Dessarin Valley]].
document_data.Personality: Ellardin was a reserved but generous man who disliked confrontation.
